quote: Satu langkah kecil hidup sejahtera dimasa mendatang

on_boarding_1.title: Plan
on_boarding_1.description: Start your financial journey with solid planning. BudgetBliss helps you set budgets, plan expenditures, and prepare emergency funds to keep your finances secure.

on_boarding_2.title: Track
on_boarding_2.description: With BudgetBliss, you can easily monitor all your financial transactions. Get detailed daily, weekly, and monthly financial reports to ensure every expense is under control and on track.

on_boarding_3.title: Achieve
on_boarding_3.description: Whatever your dreams are, BudgetBliss is here to help you achieve them. Set financial goals, track your progress, and enjoy the satisfaction of reaching each financial milestone with the right strategy.

welcome_word: Sign in to track your spending, save more, and reach your financial milestones.
register_description: Register your account and start your financial freedom
